answerText: chromatography[10] During chromatography, the analyte is placed in this type of substance before it is passed through its opposite, the stationary phase.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 7 | 4 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Types of this technique include size exclusion and HPLC, while another form of it involves placing a piece of paper partially in a solvent. For 10 points each: [10] Name this common laboratory technique, in which compounds in mixtures are separated based on factors such as solubility and boiling point.
